guanxindifangjiaotongjianshe,qianwangjiayixianchuxi[jiayixianshitielugaojiahuayanshenminxiongjihuadongtuqifudianli]shibiaoshi,dazaowanshan'bianlidetieluyunshuxitongyuanjuleyedehuanjing,shizhengfuzhongyaodeshizhengmubiao,zhipanzaizhongyangdifangxieshouhezuoxia,xiangguangongchengnengyunianruqi'ruzhiwangong,rangminzhongxiangshoutielugaojiahuadailaidebianlishenghuo.yuanzhangganxiechenmingwenliweizailifayuanweidifangzhengquzhongdajiaotongjianshe,yijijiayixianwengzhangliangxianzhangdezhichihepeihe,chuleguidaojianshe,jiayixianyesuizhukexueyuanqu'chanyeyuanquluxuwangonghou,zhubuluoshi[nonggongdaxian]mubiao.chenyuanzhangzhichu,weiyouxiaokuaisutuizhanguojiazhongdajiaotonggongchengjianshe,xingzhengyuanyujinnianyueheding[jiayixianfutielugaojiahuayanshenjihua],jiangyumuqianshigongzhongde[jiayishiqutielugaojiahuajihua]xianghulianjie'zhenghe,dazaowanshanyubianlidetieluyunshuxitong.yuqitielugaojiahuagongchengwangonghou,kedachengdushifenghe'cujindifangfazhan'xiaomitielupingjiaodao'baozhangxingcheanquan,bingtishengshenghuopinzhi.chenyuanzhangzhichu,weilaiminxionggaojiachezhanjiangchengweidifangxindibiao,xiangzhengyigechengshichaoqianbushu,huaibaowuqiongdexiwangyuyuanjingqianjin,dazaobianli'shushi'anquan,rangminzhonganjuleyedehuanjing,qipanzhongyang'difangxieshouhezuo,jiangdifangjianshedegenghao.duici,tayaoganxiezaizuodechenmingwenliweizailifayuan,jijiweidifangzhengqujianshejiyusuan,yijijiayixianwengzhangliangxianzhangdezhichihepeihe,gongtongjianshedifang,suizhukexueyuanqu'chanyeyuanquluxuwangonghou,jiayixianjiangzhubuluoshi[nonggongdaxian]mubiao.chenyuanzhangqingjiaotongbugiedaojuyujiayixianzhengfuhezuo,zaigongchengxingjianqijian,jianshaoduiminzhongshenghuoyingxiang,bingqingshigongtuanduijiasutuidongxiangguanjianshe,shigongchengyunianruqi'ruzhiwangong,rangminzhongjinkuaixiangshoutielugaojiahuadailaidebianlishenghuo.jinridongtuqifudianlizaixiangshixianruideluogushengzhongrenaozhankai,chenyuanzhangshouxiantingqujiaotongbutiedaojuyangzhengjunjuzhangshuoming[jiayixianshitielugaojiayanshe shicha[jiayishidongyilujilushanqiaogaijiangongcheng]shibiaoshi,zhongyangguanxindifanggonggongjianshe,zhenduidifangzhengfutichudejianshejihua,zhongyangjingshenshenpingguhouyuyizhichi,tigongminzhonganjuleyedeshenghuohuanjing.zhiyudifangguanqiededaolujiaotonganquanwenti,zhongyanghuitouguogongcheng'zhifa'jiaoyu'jianlidengmianxiang,gongtonglaishouhuyonglurenanquan.chenyuanzhangzhichu,weigaishandifangjiaotong,jiayishizhengfutouguo[shenghuoquandaolujiaotongxitongjianshejihua]xiangzhongyangzhengfutichu[jiayishidongyilujilushanqiaogaijiangongcheng],zongjingfeiyueyiyuan,youzhongyangbuzhujingfeiyuyiyuan,jiayishizichouyiduoyuan,bingyouminjiantuantijiayixingshantuanjuanzengqianwanyuan.jianshewangonghou,bujindafugaishandifangjiaotong,bingronghuo[niandijieyoulianggongchengjinanjiang]youdengjiangji[niandijiegonggonggongchengjinzhijiang]youdengjiangkending,zhanxianzhongyangdifanghezuo'gongsixielidejianshechengguo.chenyuanzhangqiangdiao,zhongyangguanxindifangzhongshidegonggongjianshe.difangzhengfutichujihua,jiangjiaoyouguojiafazhanweiyuanhuishenyi,bufenjianshejingfeiyouzhongyangjidifanggongtongfendan,bufenzeyouzhongyangquanefudan,zhongyanghuizaishenshenpingguhouyuyizhichi,gongtongdazaominzhonganjuleyedeshenghuohuanjing.ciwai,youguandifangjiaotonganquan,chenyuanzhangjinyibushuo,zaigongchengmianbufen,jiaotongxinzhituidongzengjiadaolulintingqudehuashe,touguoqianzhanjianshetishengdaolupinzhi'yiyuande[xiaoyuanzhoubianjixingcheanquandaolugaishanjihua],yijinianyide[yongxutishengrenxinganquanjihua],keyoudifangzhengfutijiaojihua,youzhongyangjinxingpingguyanyi,touguozhongyangdifanghezuo,tigongminzhonganquan'pingzheng'shunchangdegonggongtongxinghuanjing.zhengfuxianglaizhongshiquanguoxuetongdetongxueanquan,zhendui[xiaoyuanzhoubianbeiyuanguozhongxiaotongxuebudoagongcheng]bufen,difangketichushenqing,zhongyangjiangtouguo[yongxutishengrenxinganquanjihuaxiaoyuanzhoubianjixingcheanquandaolugaishan],jinkuaiyuyixiezhu.yuanzhangyehuyu,xingrenjijiashiyaohuxiangzunzhong,taiwanjiaotonganquancaihuiyulaiyuhao zhuchi[nianduxingzhengyuandongyuanhuibao],bingbanjiangbiaoyangyanxijidongyuanyewuxiangguanyougongrenyuanyudanwei.yuanzhangbiaoshi,chongfen'tuoshandedongyuanzhengbei,jiushizaiguojiajinjiweinanshizuidadehouqinyizhang.cicihuiyishijin()nianshishidongyuangongzuodezongjiejijiantao,gengshihouxuyouhuabingyindaodongyuangongzuodezhongyaoyiju,mianduidangqianfuzaqieyanjundeguojiqingshi,weitishengwoguofangweirenxing,houxurengyouxuduozhunbeigongzuoxuyaoyanglaigebuhuijidifangzhengfujijihezuo,qinggebuhuiyudifangzhengfuwubiyizuishenzhongdetaidu'qianzhandesiweijiyangedezhixingli,xieshoudilixiangqian,quebaogexiangdonyguanrenwushunlijinxing,gongtongweibaohuguojiaanquanjirenminshenghuonuli.chenyuanzhangyuhuiqianshouxianguanshangquanmindongyuanjishiyingpian,bingbanjiangbiaoyangnianduquanminfangweidongyuanjizaihaifangjiu(minanhao)yanxibingqituiyanjizongheshizuo[teyou]danwei'junminlianhefangkong(wananhao)yanxi[teyou]danwei'dongyuanfanganjifenleijihuazhuguanjiguanyewufangwen[jiyou]danwei'xiezhuquanminfangweidongyuanzhunbeishiwuyougongdanwei,yijituidongquanminfangweidongyuanzhunbeishiwumokairenyuandeng,bingyushoujiangdaibiaoheyingliunian.suihou,chenyuanzhangzhicishibiaoshi,touguohuiyishangbofangde[niandudongyuanjishiyingpian]ji[gexiangjiyoudongyuanyewubanjiang]dehuojiangshiyou,rangrenshenkeganshoudaojinnianzaigegebuhuiyudifangzhengfugongtongnulixia,dongyuanzhunbeigongzuoriyijingjin,yeshiwoguozhengtifangweinenglizhubutigao.yuanzhangtebieganxiegedanweisuofuchudexinlaoyunuli,bingqimiandajiachixujingjin.yuanzhangshuo,jinrizhaokaihuiyi,chulejiantaojinnianshishidongyuangongzuodezongjiewai,gengshihouxuyouhuajiyindaodongyuangongzuofeichangzhongyaodeyiju,qinggeyuhuijiguanwubizhongshi,rangwoguo[quanminfangweidongyuanyunzuojizhi]gengquwanbei,gongtongshouhuguojiajirenmindeanquan.chenyuanzhangzhichu,congqu()nianyuedeewuzhanzhengdaojinnianyuedeyihachongtu,zaizaixianshiyidanzhanzhengchongtukaishi,yiliaoliangneng'renminjibenshenghuoxuqiujitongxunwangluodengjiehuishoudaoanzhongchongji,yinciweichigejizhengfuy qianwangtainanshishicha[guodaohaotainanxitongjiaoliudaogaishanjikuananlukoulitihuagongcheng]shibiaoshi,xingzhengyuanyihedinggaigongchengjianshejihua,zongjingfeiweiyiyuan,bingyouzhongyangchuzidayue,qipantouguozhongyangyudifanggongtonghezuo,rangbengongchengruqi'ruzhi'rushidiwancheng,yigaishanyanshuixiyibei'yifuchengweihexindeguodaoyuxiangdaolukouyanzhiwenti,tigongtainanshiminshushi'anquan'bianjiedejiaotongxitong.chenyuanzhangzhichu,wemanzudifangxiangqinxuqiu,gaishanyanshuixiyibei'yifuchengweihexindeguodaojixiangdaolukouyanzhiwenti,cujintainandiquweilaifazhan,laiqingdefuzongtongguoqudanrentainanshizhangqijian,jiyuxuduozaidiliweigongtongzhengqubenxianggongcheng.tainanshizhengfuxuyunianyuetichu[guodaohaonanxianlukougaishanjiaoliudaokexingxingpinggubaogao],jingshenyitongguohou,yujin()nianyueyouxingzhengyuanhedinggaigongchengjianshejihua,zongjingfeiweiyiyuan,qizhongyouguodaojijinyizhuyiyuan,zhanbiyue,lingyoutainanshizhengfufudanyiyuan,muqianjiaotongbugaosugonglujukezhengjinxinghuanjingyingxiangchayifenxiyushejizuoye.chenyuanzhangqingjiaotongbugaogongjuyutainanshizhengfuxianghuhezuo,zuohaoshigongqijianjiaotongweichigongzuo,rang[guodaohaozhuxianlitihua]nenggouruqi'ruzhi'rushidiwangong,jianshaodiqucheliuhuxiangganrao'jisngdizhaoshilvjilukouhuiduqingxing,jinyibutishengtainanluwangdeyunzuoxiaolv,rangtainanshimindounengxiangshoushushi'anquan'bianjiedejiaotongxitong.yuanzhangyetebieganxietainanshihuangweizheshizhang'zhaoqinghuifushizhangdalizhichibenxiangjianshe,yijichentingfeiliwei'laihuiyuanliweiyuguoguowenliweizhangqiweitainandifangfazhantichuxuduobaoguiyijian,gongcudifangfanrong.chenyuanzhangdidahou,shouxiantingqujiaotongbugaogongjuzhaoxinghuajuzhanggongchengjianbao,liaojiebenanjiaoliudaogaishanjilitihuagongchenggaikuang.guodaohaoyunanlukouyinluduansujiangdaqiezhuanxiangfuza,zhishijiaotongshigupinchuan,qielukouyanzhichanghuiduzhitainanxitongjiaoliudao,yinciguihua[guodaohaozhuxianlitihua]'[xitongjiaoliudaogaishan]ji[cechedaowaiyi]denggongcheng,bingpeihezuozhuannanlukouxuqiu,yu qianwangjilongshichuxihaiyangweiyuanhuihaixunshu[nianchahuozousidupinjisiyanxianggupoanjizhehui]shibiaoshi,ganxiehaixundixiongzimeibucixinlaojianshouzaiguojingzuiqianxian<ctbrl>,jin()nianyichahuogejidupinjigongjin'feifanongyuchuchanpinwangongjin'weishuixiangyanwanbao,chajichengguoxiangdangfengshuo.yuanzhangqiangdiao,zaijiancha'jingcha'diaocha'xianbing'haixunyuguanwudengliudajiduxitongchixuhezuoxia,zhengfuyijiaojiaochulianglidefanduchengjidan,erxingzhengtuanduijuebusongxie,jiangchixuyi[sudu'zhuiren'duanjinliu]weifanduzongmubiao,tuidong[jianshaodupingonggei'jianshaodupinxuqiujijianshaodupinweihai]de[sanjiancelve],gongtongdazaowudujiayuan.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,jinrijizhehuikandaohaixunshufengshuodechajichengguo,jinnianqijinyichahuogejidupinjigongjin'feifanongyuchuchanpinwangongjin'weishuixiangyanwanbao,bujinchenggonglanzudupincongguowaizousirujing,yezuduanweijingbaoguandexiangyanjibudejinkoudedaluxiangguliurushimian.zhexiezousiwupinchuleyanchongyingxiangshehuizhianjiguojiashuishouzhiwai,weijingjianyanbaguandezousixiangyanyuxianggu,ruhanyouchaobiaoyouhaihuaxuewuzhi,genghuiyanzhongweihaiguorenjiankang.yuanzhangkendinghaixunshutongrenlixiadagong,bujinhanweiguorenjiankang,gengweitaiwanzousichajizaitianyibizhongyaogongji,8yincitazaisuimonianzhongzhiji,tediqianlaiganxiejiweimianxinkudehaixundixiongzimei.chenyuanzhangzhichu,taiwanshisimianhuanhaidemeilidaoyuguojia,haiyangyeshiwoguozuidadeziyuanyuzuitianrandeanquanpingzhang,ranermianzhangdehaianxian,querongyichengweiyouxinrenshibufafanzuideguandao.haixunshurenlisuiranzhiyouwanqianduoming,danrenglulizhuzazaihaifengchuifudediyixian,riyexinkushouhuwoguozhangdagonglidehaianxian,gongzuoshifenxinku.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,haixungongzuojianshouzaiguojingzuiqianxian,chulejinxinggangkoubianjingfangyigongzuo'feizhouzhuwendefangduyuchaji,yijiezhigezhongfeifanongyuchujixiangyandengzousifanzuiwai,gengjijiqianglichajidupin'zuduandupinyuantou,bimiandupinliurushimianweihairenmin.haixuntongrenjianshougangwei'yanshoubianjing,jijichajihaiyufanzui,lu yuxingzhengyuanhuibiaoshi,xingzhengyuanzhichitaizhongjieyunlvxianbeiyandakeng'nanyanzhanghuayian,suochidelichangshifutiaojianyiciheding,qingguojiafazhanweiyuanhuijinsuwanchengshenchachengxu,xingzhengyuanjiangjinsuhedingkexingxingpinggubaogao,xiwangzhongyangjidifangzhengfunenggoutonglihezuo,rangbenanzaoridingandonggong,yijieyunlianjietaizhongjizhanghuadeshenghuoquan,zaofuzhongbudiquminzhong.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,youguantaizhongjieyunlvxianbeiyandakeng'nanyanzhanghuayian,weitaizhongshizhengfuzhuban,jiaotongbuyizainianyuerijiangxiuzhengbaogaoshusongzhiguofahuishenyi.yuanzhangqiangdiao,xingzhengyuanzhichitaizhongjieyunlvxianbeiyandakeng'nanyanzhanghuaan,suochidelichangshifutiaojianyiciheding,qingguofahuijinsuwanchengshenchachengxu,xingzhengyuanjiangjinsuhedingkexingxingbaogao.chenyuanzhangzhichu,benanquanzhanggongli,zongjingfeiyiyuan,qizhongbeiyandakengduanbufenzaitaizhongshisheyouzhan,ernanyanzhanghuaduanbufen,zaitaizhongshiyuzhanghuaxianfenbiesheyouzhan'zhan,zhongdianzezaitaitiejinmazhan,bingqieyuzhanghuashiqudetielugaojiahualianjie.weilaiwangonghou,jiangkerangtaizhongjieyunlvxiankuodafuwufanweidaodakeng'wurijizhanghua.chenyuanzhangjinyibubiaoshi,nanyanzhanghuaduanbufenshejiyandangnianshangweidingandezhangdongkuodadushijihua,qiekuayuewuxizhihou,chulejinmazhanwai,haiyouzhanshejidushijihuaxiangguanpeihe,qingxiangguanbuhuiyuliuzhanzhi,yuquedingzhangdongdushijihuafanweijirenkouyunlianghou,xianxinghedingtaizhonglvxiankexingxingbaogao.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,benanzaizongheguihuahedingqian,bixutongbuwanchengzhangdongkuodadushijihuadeheding,yijiwanchengshangshuzhandezhoubianguihua,bingqiequedingcaiwujihuazichanglvjijingfeifentanbilihou,cainengyoulihouxudejieyungongchengtuidong.yuanzhangqiangdiao,xingzhengyuandelichangjiushizhichitaizhong,yezhichizhanghua,xiwangzhongyangjidifangzhengfutonglihezuo,rangtaizhongjieyunlvxianbeiyandakeng'nanyanzhanghuaankeyizaoridingandonggong,yijieyunlianjietaizhongjizhanghuadeshenghuoquan.jinrichuxixingzhengyuanhuidetaizhongshiwangyuminfushizhangdaib yuxingzhengyuanhuitingquneizhengbu[tuidongshehuizhuzhaichengguoyutishengshezhaiyongdigonggeijingjincuoshi]baogaohoubiaoshi,zhengfuziniantuidongshezhaizhengce,zaigebuhuiyudifangzhengfugongtongnulixia,jiangyuniandishunlidachengwanhushezhaimubiao;xiajieduanjiangyiniandawanhushezhaiweimubiao,bingyishenghuoquanfangshitongchouguihua.yuanzhangqiangdiao,weilaigexianshijinxingzhengtikaifaqubanliquduanzehngshoujishidizhonghuashi,bixubaoliugongshezhaishiyong,bingqiezhuananrangshougeizhongyangzhengfuxingbanshezhai;ciwai,dushigengxinjidazhongyunshudaoxiangkaifa()de[rongjijiangli]ji[zengerongji]xiangmu,yexuyouxiannarutigongshezhai,yituozhanshezhaiyongdideduoyuanqudeguandao.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,weidachengcaiyingwenzongtongnianwanhushezhaizhengcemubiao,neizhengbubuduanjingjinxiangguanzuowei,nianqigengqidong[zhongyangzhudao,difangpeihe]moshi,jiasushezhaidechengzhangliang,zaigebuhuijidifangzhengfugongtongnulixia,nianduwanchenghuandaozhijiexingjianshezhai,nianjiangbianjiquanguo,yuqikeshunliyuniandidachengwanhushezhaimubiao,xiangguanzhengcetuidongchengguozhidekending.chenyuanzhangzhichu,xiajieduanshezhaiyiniandawanhuweimubiao,jiangyishenghuoquanfangshisheding,qingneizhengbujijituidongbanli,bingqinggebuhuichixupandianqiejijitigongtudigongneizhengbuxingbanshezhai;lingqingneizhengbujijipandianxiangguanfaling,yuzhengtikaifadiqunaru[shehuifulisheshiyongdi]huo[shezhaizhuanyongqu].weituozhanshezhaiyongdideduoyuanqudeguandao,weilaigexianshijinxingzhengtikaifaqubanliquduanzhengshoujishidizhonghuashi,bixubaoliugongshezhaishiyong,bingqiezhuananrangshougeizhongyangzhengfuxingbanshezhai.ciwai,dushigengxinjidazhongyunshudaoxiangkaifa()de[rongjijiangli]ji[zengerongji]xiangmu,yexuyouxiannarutigongshezhai,shichengshikaifazhiji,jiunengyuxiannarujuzhuguihua,yiyinyingweilaizhoubianzhengtifazhanjijuzhuxuqiu,ruqidachengxiajieduanshezhaizhengcemubiao.

zaihangzhengyuanhuitingquguojiafazhanweiyuanhui[qianzhanjichujianshejihuashizhengliangdianzixunwang]baogaohoubiaoshi,gaiwangzhan()yiminzhongjiaoduweichufadian,guinachudaminzhongyougan'chengxiaoxianzhudeqianzhanjianshejihua,keyixianshibiehuobadajianshebieliaojiezhengfuyifenbiewanchengdejihuaneirongjizhongyaochengguo,huanyingminzhongduojialiyong.yuanzhangyezhishixiangguanbuhuizhudongxuandaozhuzhengjihuadetuidongchengxiaoyuliangdian,bingyangeguankongqianzhanjichujianshejihuadisiqitebieyusuandezhixingjindu,zhipantouguozhongyangyudifangzhengfugongtongnuli,jiasudachenggexiangjihuademubiaojixiaoyi.chenyuanzhangzhichu,zhengfuziminguonianqitouguoqianzhanjichujianshetebieyusuan,zaizhongyanggebuhuiyudifangzhengfululihezuoxia,yiwanchengxuduoqianzhanxingjianshe,weiyinzixunluocha,xuduominzhongduixiangguanjianshechengguobingbuqingchu,yibuzhisuoshujiaxiangyiyouneixiegonggongjianshe,yincizhengfuyoubiyaojiangxiangguanxunxixiangguorengongkaijielu.tayaoganxiexianggkanbuhuipeihegsuofahuijianzhiwancheng[qianzhanjihuashizhengliangdianzixunwang],bianliminzhongliaojiezhengfuzhexienianlaituidongqianzhanjihuadezhongyaochengguo.chenyuanzhangqiangdiao,[qianzhanjihuashizhengliangdianzixunwang]shiyiminzhongjiaoduweichufadian,touguosandawangyeshejilinian,tigongjianshedidian'jihuaqicheng'shuoming'xiaoyi'jingfeidengneirong.chuguinachudaminzhongyougan'chengxiaoxianzhudeqianzhanjianshejihua,minzhongyekeyixianshibiechaxungexiangzhenshiqudeqianzhanjihuajianshe,huozhijiecongbadajianshebieliaojiezhengfuyifenbiewanchengdejihuaneirong,huanyingminzhongduojialiyong,yeqingxiangguanbuhuizhudongduiminzhongxuandaozhuzhengjihuadetuidongchengxiaoyuliangdian.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,qianzhanjichujianshejihuatuidongqijin,chengguofengshuo,zhengtixiaoyihangaijingji'shehuijihuanjingdengmianxiang,duiyucujinquyujunheng'tishengminzhongshenghuopinzhi,zhujianchongshiwoguochanyeweilaisuoxugexiangjichujianshedengfangmian,junyoushizhibangzhu.muqianqianzhanjichujianshejihuadisiqitebieyusuanshangzaizhixingzhong,qingxiangguanbuhuichix zaihangzhengyuanhuitingquxingzhengyuangonggonggongchengweiyuanhui[zhengfuzixunfuwucaigougexin－zianruguijicaigouzhiyin]baogaohoubiaoshi,zianjiguoan,gejiguanjiexutigaojingjuebingtourubiyaoziyuan,zuohaofanghuzhunbei.benciyouxingzhengyuangongchenghuijishuweifazhanbugongtonghezuo,jiangzianguidingnaruzhengfudezixuncaigou,xiezhugejiguanqianghuajiluoshizianzuowei,yikecujinguoneixiangguanchanyetishengguojijingzhengli,qingyouguanbuhuichixusoujichanyejijiguanhuikuiyijian,shishigundongdiaoxiuxiangguanneirong;lingqingxingzhengyuanzhujizongchuyushuweibuzhenduiyunduanhuaqushiyanyixiangguanyusuankemujibianliefangshidiaozhengcuoshi.chenyuanzhangzhichu,zianjiguoan,geguoduiyzuianyitidezhongshijitourujingfeizhuniantisheng,ertaiwanweiquanqiuzaoshouziangongjiderequzhiyi,gengxianshiqianghuazianfanghudejipoxing,yincigejiguandoubixutigaojingjuebingtourubiyaodeziyuan,shikezuohaoxiangguandefanghuzhunbei.yuanzhangqiangdiao,weileqianghuazhengfuzianfanghujicujinchanyejinbu,kuabuhuixuchixuhezuo,benciyouxingzhengyuangongchenghuijishuweibugongtonghezuo,jiangzianguidingnaruzhengfudezixuncaigou,xiezhugejiguanqianghuajiluoshizianzuowei,yikecujinguoneixiangguanchanyetishengguojijingzhengli,duiyubuhuijianhezuojiejuewenti,tayaobiaodakendingjiganxie,bingqingdajiachixunuli.chenyuanzhangqinggebuhuijigedifangzhengfuluoshizhixingbencizixunfuwucaigougexinxiangguanshixiang,bingqingshuweibu'xingzhengyuangongchenghuichixusoujichanyejijiguanhuikuiyijian,shishigundongdiaoxiuxiangguanneirong,yichaoxiangzhengfuzianwanzhengfanghu,chanyetishengjinjunguojideyuanjingmaijin.lingjianyuruantijiziliaokudeyunduanhuashimuqianzixunfuwudefazhanzhuliu,xiangguanyusuandekemujibianliefangshiyiyingnengyinyingyunduanhuadequshidiaozheng,lirubianlieweizibenmendengzuofa,yuanzhangyeqingxingzhengyuanzhujizongchuyushuweibugongtongyanyi.

chuxi[niantaioumengxingbiepingquanluntan]kaimushishibiaoshi,ganxieoumengyutaiwanxieshoucujinxingbiepingdeng,jinnianlaiyinweiyiqing,budanchanyeshouchuang,yeyinqixuduoxingbiebupingdengdeyiti,yuanzhangchongshentaiwanduixingsaorao'xingqinhailingrongrendelichang,zhilibimianrenheshanghaifasheng,bingrangshoushanghaizhehuodexuyaodexiezhu.xingzhengyuaznhengzhushoucongsanmianxiangjiantaoyugaishan,bingjijiyanyixiugaixingpingsanfa,qidaitouguojianquandefalingyujizhi,rangzhenggeshehuiyiqiyingzaoxingbieyoushandehuanjing.chenyuanzhangzhicishi,shouxiandaibiaotaiwanhuanyinggeweiguibin,bingxiangyuandaoerlaidegeguodaibiaoyijixianshangcanyudeguibinzhiyi;yetebieganxieouzhoujingmaobanshichu'waijiaobu'tongzhizixunrexianxiehuijimeiguoguojiminzhuxiehuizaihuiyichoubeiguochengyubanliqijiandedinglixiangzhu,cuchengbenciluntan.chenyuanzhangzhichu,taiwanyuoumengyunian[shoujietaioumengrenquanzishanghuiyi]dachengjianli[taioumengxingbiepingquanhezuojixunlianjiagou]()degongshi,bingyunianzhengshiqidong,luxubanliduochanggongzuofangjiyantaohui,qijianshuangfangyitongjianzhengwoguotongxinghunyinfa[sifayuanshizidiqisibahaojieshishixingfa]shishi.yuanzhangganxieoumengduibenjiagoudezhichi,yehengaoxingjinrizaicihezuobanlicicishenghui.jin()nianshixunlianjiagoutuixingdezuihouyinian,xiwangjiyouweiqitiandeluntan,weishuangfangdejiaoliuhezuojinxingjieduanxingdehuiguyuzhanwang.chenyuanzhanghuiguzhenianlai,quanqiupangfushengminggongtongti,gongtongjingliyiqingdexijuan,gedishishifengchengjijujiagelicuoshi,suifangzhiyiqingdekuosan,danyejiajuxuduoxingbiebupingdengdeyiti,tebieshiguanguang'lvyou'capnyinjifuwuyeyanzhongshouchuang'yixianyihurenyuanjijiatingzhaoguzerenjiazhong,yijijiatingbaolihuoshiwangluxingbiebaolifashenglvdezengjia,doushinvxingshoudaogengduodeboji.geguoyedoujijituidongyiqinghoudefusuzuofa,xiangxintouguozhecideluntan,dajianenghuxiangfenxiangjingyan,yiqijiasufusudejiaobu.chenyuanzhangzhichu,jinrizaitaiwanshehui,youxuduoxingpingshijianbeijielu,yinqigejiedeguanzhu.benciluntanyetebieanpaixingbiebaolifangzhiyitide
